CustomField.description: Formula used to determine accuracy of forecast
CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND( ISBLANK( Milestone__r.Target_Period__c ),Forecast_Date__c >= TODAY()), "On Target",
IF ( AND (RIGHT(Milestone__r.Target_Period__c,2) = RIGHT(Forecast_Period__c,2), MID (Milestone__r.Target_Period__c,4,4) = MID (Forecast_Period__c,4,4), Milestone_Target_Date__c < TODAY()) , "On Target",
IF ( AND (VALUE(RIGHT(Milestone__r.Target_Period__c,2)) < VALUE(RIGHT(Forecast_Period__c,2)), MID (Milestone__r.Target_Period__c,4,4) = MID (Forecast_Period__c,4,4), Milestone_Target_Date__c < TODAY()) , "Before Target",
"Pass Target")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula used to determine accuracy of forecast
CustomField.label: Forecast Outcome
